name: Zombie Infection (survival game)
description: A Game That I made, this was a game that was and still is used in my game dev school, this game is being used in term 2, coding made by my teacher, although the game's sprites and assets were used from another game, and some sounds were used from Roblox, (sorry if some were stolen from another game, again this was never supposed to be a publicly released game, but I uploaded it so people would download it and play it, so..... enjoy!
